name: Horsepill
body:
# HORSEPILL: a New Kind of Linux Rootkit
See the link for code to get the code.  As presented at my [BH USA talk](https://www.blackhat.com/us-16/briefings/schedule/#horse-pill-a-new-type-of-linux-rootkit-3370).  Better web page to be put in place post-vegas.  All code is there.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
